text: Fans who ’ ve missed Julianna Margulies since “ The Good Wife ” ended can rejoice : The Emmy - winning actress has taken a crucial role in the AMC series “ Dietland. ” The... Julianna Margulies has been cast in the upcoming AMC drama “ Dietland, ” Variety has learned. The 10 - episode series, based on Sarai Walker ’ s 2015 novel of the same name,... Slapped but not forgotten, Julianna Margulies will soon return to TV. Margulies, who spent seven seasons playing Alicia Florrick in The Good Wife, has booked a starring... Meet Plum Kettle, the main character of AMC ’ s new show Dietland, who ’ s trying to slim down to live up to society ’ s standards.
